scripts.Backend-install: cd server && npm install && npm install del-cli
scripts.Backend-Deploy: cd server/build && eb init full-stack-ali-2 -r $AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -p node.js  && eb use fullstackali2-env &&  eb setenv POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST POSTGRES_DB_DEV=$POSTGRES_DB_DEV POSTGRES_USER=$POSTGRES_USER POSTGRES_PASS=$POSTGRES_PASS BCRYPT_PASS=$BCRYPT_PASS TOKEN_SECRET=$TOKEN_SECRET SALT_ROUNDS=$SALT_ROUNDS NODE_ENV=$NODE_ENV
scripts.start: cd frontend && index.html && cd .. && cd server && npm install && npm run build && npm run start
